welcome_message_body: Welcome to New Bedford, where historic charm meets modern innovation! Known for its rich maritime history and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Symposium
restaurants.description: The Symposium is a american restaurant located in New Bedford.
restaurants.address: 851 Mount Pleasant St, New Bedford, MA 02745

restaurants.name: Golden Star Chinese
restaurants.description: Golden Star Chinese is a chinese restaurant located in New Bedford.

restaurants.name: D'Angelo Grilled Sandwiches
restaurants.description: D'Angelo Grilled Sandwiches is a sandwich spot located in New Bedford.
restaurants.address: 902 Mount Pleasant St, New Bedford, MA 02745

restaurants.name: Gary's Best
restaurants.description: Gary's Best is a hot dog joint located in New Bedford.

restaurants.name: Antonio's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Antonio's Restaurant is a restaurant located in New Bedford.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at State Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at T. F. Green Airport, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a smaller terminal at T. F. Green Airport, primarily used by regional airlines such as Cape Air and Southern Airways Express.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'PVD Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Martha's Vineyard Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
